title: koLalanUduttA banda
sahitya:
koLlanUdutta banda namma gOpiya kanda koLalanUduvadu balu canda


caraNam 1    A vasudEvana kanda iva nODe dEvaki basiroLu banda mAva kamsana konda bhAva janayya mukunda
    caraNam 2    muttinAbharaNa toTTu hastadi koLala koTTu kastUri tilakavaniTTA tutturu tururemba nAdava piDiya
    caraNam 3    hindE gOvugaLa hiNDu munde gOpAla daNDu hindakke daityara konda purandara viTTala canda
